thread.title: William Bostwick
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by William Bostwick

author: William Bostwick
title: William Bostwick
text: I was contacted by phone from a SelectQuote: agent after visiting their website. I was looking for homeowners insurance. The agent was very professional and personable. I She Quote: d me the price of the homeowners and then what it would cost to add my auto. The price for both was less than I was paying for my auto alone! Thank You SelectQuote: for saving me a lot of money!
